title: Steamtown National Historic Site: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Nearby Attractions              Nearby Attractions         Nay Aug Falls, a National Natural Landmark, is located in Nay Aug Park, not far from Steamtown.Â  The Everhart Museum is also located at Nay Aug Park.
